author: Wayne Tanner
comment: Does all you would need with a flashlight. There are two color choices both adjustable that alternate with a touch of the screen. A slide to the right and it's off. Adjustments are made by swiping left. Simple.
title: Simple but Works

author: Luiza Aguiar
comment: Does not work.

author: Min •_• Christy
comment: I downloaded it and i couldnt find the app to open it

author: Steven Tang
comment: Perfect for preventing screen burn in 🤓

author: Jacob G
comment: The first time I installed it, it didn't seem to work. I re-synced the apps through Android Wear and it came up. That's the only fault.. and it was mine. This is such a great and simple app which will come in handy often. Thankyou!
title: Really cool...and useful!

author: Andy Anderson
comment: Initially the "OK Google, start flashlight" launched the flashlight app on my phone. Ah, a conflict I thought. Then realised the Android wear version hasn't finished downloading and installing. After waiting, the phrase actually launched the wear app instead. Brilliantly simple. On screen toggle button would be good.
title: Works as described

author: Andre Ch
comment: Great app now i can find my teeth with my watch. You young punks did a great job but don't let it go to your head. And stay off my grass.
title: Mean old man

author: Chris Paton
comment: This app only does one thing but it does it well. However, Android 5.1 added a built-in app that does the same thing. And the built-in app is better localised and called "torch" in Britain unlike this app.

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: That's wrong because with the new update you get a lot of new features the flashlight app on watch doesn't have. Please review again. Thank you.

title: Simple and effective, but now defunct

author: Michael Simons
comment: A great little light in a pinch. Not the brightest light but will get you to that bush in the middle of the night while camping to take a pee...
title: Light in a pinch.

author: Jason Murray
comment: Love this app. Can't beat a hands free flashlight. Would like to be able to turn it of with voice commands tho.
title: Let there be light!

author: Paul Lammertsma
comment: I was going to build a wear app that starts with "Start Flashlight", shows a white screen on max brightness with a wake lock. No need! This app does precisely that!
title: Perfect!

author: Charles Odom
comment: "OK Google.....Start Flashlight!" and there is white light from my watch.  Bright enough yet not car head lights.
title: All of the Light!!    Moto 360

author: James Frary
comment: Just used this on my LG G watch. I was able to see using the white screen provided by this app. Helpful.
title: It is actually useful!

author: George Nixon
comment: Nothing more, nothing less. Easy to dismiss when you're done seeing things.
title: Does what it does

author: Andrew LeDawson
comment: The 5.1 update for Wear added a flashlight app, and except for the dim flashlight icon on Google's version they work identically.
title: Worked great

author: Sandy P
comment: It is screen, not flash, but since my watch doesn't have a camera, thats just perfect.
title: Yup.  It's a flashlight.

author: wazm
comment: ...and it does what it does. Although I had to read in the comments how to get this thing loaded into the menu and what voice command to use.
title: It is what it is...

author: Marc Kramer
comment: Nice extra to have. Only a 4 cause it's not super bright. But, it is a watch,  not a flashlight. Cool stuff.
title: Works

author: Quiet -
comment: Never have to disturb my wife again when I come in late at night. have just enough light for you undress and get dressed in dark. Also nice in movie theaters.
title: Grat app

author: Morimasa Igarashi
comment: Not the brightest light but it has come in handy enough for me to leave this positive review.
title: Comes in handy when all you need is a little light.

author: Frank Tedesco
comment: It's just white screen, folks. Nada mas.
title: Flashlight is overstating it

author: Kenny Reece
comment: app is crap.And who says,you Guys?this ain't Yankee coxty
title: flashlights app

author: kay kay
comment: Pls make a update

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: Wait until app is synchronized on watch. Could take up to 2 minutes. Please review again. Thanks.

title: Don't know how to use it

author: Andy Martin
comment: "Start flashlight" and my watch face turns on brighter then a redneck truch with extra headlights.
title: Okay Google

author: Brian and Julee
comment: Doesn't work on motog

author: Randy Flatt
comment: Could not get it to download.
title: Randy Flatt

author: Ted Miller
comment: I considered a lower star rating because how can I say I love a flashlight app. But use it often and you'll understand.
title: It's a flashlight

author: Brandon Houghton
comment: No more features than necessary, and completely useful! It's an excellent addition to my smart watch
title: Excellent!

author: William Voss
comment: For some reason this app takes up 6mb which seems like a whole lot considering what it does.
title: Takes up a lot of space

author: Michael T.
comment: Fails to start on voice command most of the time
title: Nice when it works

author: Greg Haugsness
comment: Does what I need it to do. It's great when I don't need a lot of light like when I'm walking to bed and my girlfriend is asleep

author: Skip Ordway
comment: Works great in a pinch.  What will they think of next!
title: Hey guys.. Look want I have

author: Tarun Singh
comment: I double tap my 360 and it doesn't show menu. Flashlight is always on

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: That's wrong because with the new update you get a lot of new features the flashlight app on watch doesn't have. Please review again. Thank you.

title: Buggy

author: Marty Chamberlain
comment: Does what it says, does not ask for special elevated permissions.  Good app!
title: Does the job, no special privileges

author: William Gongola
comment: Looks great and full of features but please optimize it for the G Watch R/circular watches.
title: Looks awesome

author: icq niels
comment: does the job perfectly, only will not start by voice activation
title: simple and effective

author: Junior Jamison
comment: It said The app instald but It not.in my apps
title: Not working

author: Johan Agurén
comment: Works pretty good. Personally, I prefer my phone's camera flash LED. (Since I always carry it anyway.) Regardless, good stuff!
title: Works. Free.

author: Brian O'Connell
comment: Does what you think and doesn't need to read your contacts to do it!

author: Ameerun Nessa
comment: A must have app for andriod wear! Simple and effective! - LG G Watch R
title: Amazing!
